statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-7 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 2 \, x + 7 , 9 \, x^{3} - 7 \, x^{2} - 10 \, x - 5 , -4 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 3 , -3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 3 , -x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
